snippet: Readers discuss charges against a 78-year-old man accused of having sex with his wife, who had dementia, without her consent.
lead_paragraph: Readers discuss charges against a 78-year-old man accused of having sex with his wife, who had dementia, without her consent.

headline.print_headline: Nursing Home Case: Dementia and Sexual Consent
